title: Is it correct to say 'since last two days I have been sick'? - Quora

response.answer_text: The correct form of this sentence should be ‘I have been ill for the last two days’. Beacuse since is used for a point of time for eg. I have been learning music since 2010. For is used for a period of time. eg. I have been learning music for many years.

No that's not correct…’since’ only works when you nominate a time..such as ' I have been sick since last night:.or..I have been unwell ever since I ate that prawn cocktail…but in your example just use ' for'. e.g. I have been sick for the last two days. RMc.
